title: Riot is even confused on their own philosophy's.
body:
Remember when the few patches when they changed the cost of items for "clean numbers"? Now, with the {{item:3078}} changes 3733 gold they are back to their old ways. 

Riot reminds of Donald Trump. Promises one thing (Solo queue) and then doesn't deliver. They say they are going in one direction (clean numbers) and then they flip-flop back to their old ways.

Make League of Legends Great Again

lbvs
